title: Luvli.pl
description: An e-commerce platform for ordering personalized jewelry - a backend and 2 frontend apps - an admin dashboard and a client website.
tools: Node.js, Express.js, Sequelize.js, MySQL, Nuxt.js, TailwindCSS, Vuetify

title: Auroria.pl
description: An e-commerce ecosystem including 2 frontend apps - an admin dashboard and a client website, and 10 backend microservices, such as managing a warehouse, orders, offers, a 3D configurator, customer service, and a blog.
tools: Node.js, Express.js, Sequelize.js, MySQL, Nuxt.js, TailwindCSS, Vuetify, Three.js

title: Ringeo.pl
description: A comparison tool for engagement rings made by Polish jewelers - a backend scrapping data from external websites and serving them to the frontend app.
tools: Node.js, Express.js, Sequelize.js, MySQL, Nuxt.js, Vuetify

title: Healthcare Hireos
description: My thesis project. A hiring platform for healthcare workers using location presentation on digital maps. Including REST API, admin dashboard, and client website. The project was published on Github.
tools: Node.js, Typescript, Nest.js, TypeORM, PostgreSQL, Next.js, TailwindCSS, MaterialUI

title: Piamarket.sk
description: A frontend of the automotive marketplace for used cars including presentation and searching of car offers. Prepared for Porsche Interauto Slovakia.

title: Tikitaka.pl
description: The frontend of a booking system for ski trips including presentation of hotels, ski resorts, and additional services.

title: Audi Sales App
description: The frontend of an internal app for Audi to manage sales of new cars in Poland. Based on data modification by spreadsheets rendered in the browser.

title: VGP Training App
description: The internal system for Volkswagen Group Poland to conduct interactive training for car dealers. While driving cars they have to answer questions and complete tasks. I've made an admin dashboard of this system.

title: VGP Training Academy platform
description: I played a supporting role in creating the frontend of one of the key apps of Volkswagen Group Poland - an  app for managing the employee development process.
